auto_kappa.plot.alamode.dos.get_dos(dfile, nfreq, nat)

Read DOS file :param nfreq: # of frequencies :type nfreq: integer :param nat: # of atoms in a primitive cell :type nat: integer

Returns:

  • dos_total (array, float, shape=(nfreq)) – Total DOS

  • dos_atom (ndarray, float, shape=(nfreq, nat)) – Atom projected DOS

auto_kappa.plot.alamode.dos.get_elements(dfile)

Read elements in a primitive cell

Parameter

dfilestring

DOS file name

returns:

  • elements (array, string, shape=(nels)) – elements (H, He, Li, …, etc)

  • nat_el (array, integer, shape=(nels)) – # of each element

  • nels (integer) – # of kinds of element
